product_name: Columbia Super Bonehead Classic Shirt - Men's Extended Sizes - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed to meet the needs of active hikers and fishermen, the men's Columbia Super Bonehead Classic Shirt in extended sizes is made of lightweight cotton with UPF 30 sun protection. 100% cotton poplin shirt keeps you cool in hot weather and protected from harmful UV rays, whether playing on the water or hiking ridgelines. Angler-specific features include 4 fly-box pockets, a rod holder loop and a utility loop. Mesh-lined vents at back shoulder increase airflow. Columbia Bonehead Classic Shirt in extended sizes for men also features a button-down collar. Closeout.
short_description: Designed to meet the needs of active hikers and fishermen, the men's Columbia Super Bonehead Classic Shirt in extended sizes is made of lightweight cotton with UPF 30 sun protection.
